transformations.name: UpdateRecords
transformations.description: Input rows that match on SourceLine

transformations.name: ExistingHash
transformations.description: Hash of characterising fields to match WTD and MTD elements

transformations.name: MarkUpdate1
transformations.description: Update the value and lastupdated date

transformations.name: InputHash
transformations.description: Hash of elements to identify similar records

transformations.name: NewRecords
transformations.description:
Input rows that do not match on SourceLine
NOTE Exists does not join the subquery

transformations.name: SplitTimeLines
transformations.description: Split MTD and WTD records from DAY records

transformations.name: MarkUpdate2
transformations.description: Update the value, sourceline and lastupdated date

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.description: pki and new value and lastupdated

transformations.name: Select2
transformations.description: PKI, and new sourceline, lastupdated and value

transformations.name: KeyFromSourceline
transformations.description: Look up the fact pki from the source line for matching source lines

transformations.name: LookupCurrent
transformations.description: Lookup primary key for matched record from sourceline

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BrewName as string,
		DateStarting as date,
		TimeLine as string,
		FlowMeasure as string,
		Section as string,
		Area as string,
		Value as double,
		Line as string,
		Brewhouse as string,
		MetricName as string,
		PeriodDate as date,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		pkiSDLevers as long,
		fkBatchID as integer,
		SourceLine as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingTable
source(output(
		pkiFactKPI as long,
		SourceLine as long,
		LastUpdated as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceIDs
source(output(
		pkiFactKPI as long,
		fkDate as date,
		BrewName as string,
		TimeLine as string,
		Subdivision as string,
		Line as string,
		Brewhouse as string,
		LocationLookup as string,
		MetricName as string,
		SourceLine as long,
		LastUpdated as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FactLookup
source(output(
		pkiMetric as long,
		MetricLU as string,
		CheckCount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> MetricLookup
source(output(
		SiteName as string,
		SiteLookup as string,
		fkSite as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SIteLookup
source(output(
		pkiLocation as long,
		Division as string,
		Subdivision as string,
		Line as string,
		Brewhouse as string,
		LocationLookup as string,
		CheckCount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LocationLookup
source(output(
		pkiTimeLine as integer,
		TimeLine as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TimeLineLookup
source(output(
		pkiPackLine as long,
		fkSite as long,
		LineName as string,
		CheckCount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PackLineLookup
source(output(
		pkiBrewhouse as long,
		fkSite as long,
		BrewhouseName as string,
		CheckCount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> BrewhouseLookup
source(output(
		pkiFactKPI as long,
		fkDate as date,
		fkSite as long,
		fkLocation as long,
		fkPackLine as long,
		fkBrewhouse as long,
		fkMetric as long,
		fkDomain as integer,
		fkTimeLine as integer,
		Value as double,
		WeightingFactor as double,
		Target as double,
		TargetWeightingFactor as double,
		SourceLine as long,
		fkBatch as long,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		Disable as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FactCopy
InputHash, SourceIDs exists(StagingTable@SourceLine == SourceIDs@SourceLine,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> UpdateRecords
FactLookup derive(hashExisting = md5(toString(fkDate), BrewName, TimeLine, Line, Brewhouse, MetricName)) ~> ExistingHash
Select6 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkUpdate1
StagingTable derive(TMTimeLine = (trim(TimeLine) == 'MTD') || (trim(TimeLine) == 'YTD'),
		InputHash = md5(toString(PeriodDate), BrewName, TimeLine, Line, Brewhouse, MetricName),
		LocLookup1 = lower(trim(Area) + trim(coalesce(Line, '')) + trim(coalesce(Brewhouse, ''))),
		LineLookup = toString(SiteLookupCache#lookup(BrewName).fkSite) + '|' + Line,
		BrewhouseLookup = toString(SiteLookupCache#lookup(BrewName).fkSite) + '|' + Brewhouse,
		fkDate = PeriodDate) ~> InputHash
InputHash, SourceIDs exists(StagingTable@SourceLine == SourceIDs@SourceLine,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewRecords
NewRecords split((trim(TimeLine) == "MTD") || (trim(TimeLine) == "WTD"),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitTimeLines@(MTDWTDTimeLines, DAYTimeLine)
ConditionalSplit1@FuzzyMatched alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkUpdate2
SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines, ExistingHash lookup(InputHash == hashExisting,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
MarkUpdate1 select(mapColumn(
		pkiFactKPI,
		LastUpdated,
		Value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
MarkUpdate2 select(mapColumn(
		pkiFactKPI,
		SourceLine,
		LastUpdated,
		Value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select2
FactLookup select(mapColumn(
		pkiFactKPI,
		fkDate,
		BrewName,
		TimeLine,
		Subdivision,
		Line,
		Brewhouse,
		LocationLookup,
		MetricName,
		SourceLine,
		LastUpdated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> KeyFromSourceline
UpdateRecords, FactCopy lookup(StagingTable@SourceLine == FactCopy@SourceLine,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto',
	pickup: 'any')~> LookupCurrent
SplitTimeLines@DAYTimeLine derive(fkSite = SiteLookupCache#lookup(BrewName).fkSite,
		fkMetric = MetricLookupCache#lookup(MetricName).fkMetric,
		fkLocation = LocationCache#lookup(LocLookup1).fkLocation,
		fkTimeLine = TimeLineCache#lookup(TimeLine).fkTimeLine,
		fkPackLine = PackLineCache#lookup(LineLookup).fkPackLine,
		fkBrewhouse = BrewhouseCache#lookup(BrewhouseLookup).fkBrewhouse,
		fkDomain = 1,
		fkBatchL = toLong(0),
		WeightingFactor = toDouble(0),
		Target = toDouble(0),
		TargetWeightingFactor = toDouble(0),
		Disable = false()) ~> LookupKeys
LocationLookup derive(LocLookup = lower(trim(Subdivision) + trim(coalesce(Line, '')) + trim(coalesce(Brewhouse, '')))) ~> LocLookup
PackLineLookup derive(LineKey = toString(fkSite) + '|' + LineName) ~> PackLineKey
BrewhouseLookup derive(BrewhouseKey = toString(fkSite) + '|' + BrewhouseName) ~> BrewhouseKey
LookupKeys alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkInsert
Select3 split(InputHash == hashExisting,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(FuzzyMatched, FuzzyUnmatched)
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		BrewName = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@BrewName,
		DateStarting,
		TimeLine = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@TimeLine,
		FlowMeasure,
		Section,
		Area,
		Value,
		Line = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@Line,
		Brewhouse = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@Brewhouse,
		MetricName = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@MetricName,
		PeriodDate,
		LastUpdated = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@LastUpdated,
		fkBatchID,
		SourceLine = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@SourceLine,
		InputHash,
		pkiFactKPI,
		fkDate = SplitTimeLines@MTDWTDTimeLines@fkDate,
		hashExisting,
		LocLookup1,
		LineLookup,
		BrewhouseLookup
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
ConditionalSplit1@FuzzyUnmatched derive(fkSite = SiteLookupCache#lookup(BrewName).fkSite,
		fkMetric = MetricLookupCache#lookup(MetricName).fkMetric,
		fkLocation = LocationCache#lookup(LocLookup1).fkLocation,
		fkTimeLine = TimeLineCache#lookup(TimeLine).fkTimeLine,
		fkPackLine = PackLineCache#lookup(LineLookup).fkPackLine,
		fkBrewhouse = BrewhouseCache#lookup(BrewhouseLookup).fkBrewhouse,
		fkDomain = 1,
		fkBatchL = toLong(0),
		WeightingFactor = toDouble(0),
		Target = toDouble(0),
		TargetWeightingFactor = toDouble(0),
		Disable = false()) ~> LookupKeys2
LookupKeys2 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkInsert1
MarkInsert1 select(mapColumn(
		fkDate,
		fkSite,
		fkLocation,
		fkPackLine,
		fkBrewhouse,
		fkMetric,
		fkDomain,
		fkTimeLine,
		Value,
		WeightingFactor,
		Target,
		TargetWeightingFactor,
		SourceLine,
		fkBatch = fkBatchL,
		LastUpdated,
		Disable
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select4
MarkInsert select(mapColumn(
		fkDate,
		fkSite,
		fkLocation,
		fkPackLine,
		fkBrewhouse,
		fkMetric,
		fkDomain,
		fkTimeLine,
		Value,
		WeightingFactor,
		Target,
		TargetWeightingFactor,
		SourceLine,
		fkBatch = fkBatchL,
		LastUpdated,
		Disable
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select5
LookupCurrent select(mapColumn(
		pkiFactKPI,
		fkDate = FactCopy@fkDate,
		fkSite,
		fkLocation,
		fkPackLine,
		fkBrewhouse,
		fkMetric,
		fkDomain,
		fkTimeLine,
		Value = StagingTable@Value,
		WeightingFactor,
		Target,
		TargetWeightingFactor,
		SourceLine = FactCopy@SourceLine,
		fkBatch = fkBatchID,
		LastUpdated = StagingTable@LastUpdated,
		Disable
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select6
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		pkiFactKPI as long,
		fkDate as date,
		fkSite as long,
		fkLocation as long,
		fkPackLine as long,
		fkBrewhouse as long,
		fkMetric as long,
		fkDomain as integer,
		fkTimeLine as integer,
		Value as double,
		WeightingFactor as double,
		Target as double,
		TargetWeightingFactor as double,
		SourceLine as long,
		fkBatch as long,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		Disable as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['pkiFactKPI'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		pkiFactKPI,
		LastUpdated,
		Value
	)) ~> UpdateFact2
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		pkiFactKPI as long,
		fkDate as date,
		fkSite as long,
		fkLocation as long,
		fkPackLine as long,
		fkBrewhouse as long,
		fkMetric as long,
		fkDomain as integer,
		fkTimeLine as integer,
		Value as double,
		WeightingFactor as double,
		Target as double,
		TargetWeightingFactor as double,
		SourceLine as long,
		fkBatch as long,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		Disable as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['pkiFactKPI'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		pkiFactKPI,
		Value,
		SourceLine,
		LastUpdated
	)) ~> UpdateFact1
Select5 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		fkDate as date,
		fkSite as long,
		fkLocation as long,
		fkPackLine as long,
		fkBrewhouse as long,
		fkMetric as long,
		fkDomain as integer,
		fkTimeLine as integer,
		Value as double,
		WeightingFactor as double,
		Target as double,
		TargetWeightingFactor as double,
		SourceLine as long,
		fkBatch as long,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		Disable as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	saveOrder: 4,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		fkDate,
		fkSite,
		fkLocation,
		fkPackLine,
		fkBrewhouse,
		fkMetric,
		fkDomain,
		fkTimeLine,
		Value,
		WeightingFactor,
		Target,
		TargetWeightingFactor,
		SourceLine,
		fkBatch,
		LastUpdated,
		Disable
	)) ~> InsertFactD
SIteLookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['SiteLookup'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		SiteLookup,
		fkSite
	)) ~> SiteLookupCache
MetricLookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['MetricLU'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: (1),
	mapColumn(
		fkMetric = pkiMetric,
		MetricLU
	)) ~> MetricLookupCache
LocLookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['LocationLookup'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: (1),
	mapColumn(
		fkLocation = pkiLocation,
		LocationLookup
	)) ~> LocationCache
TimeLineLookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['TimeLine'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		fkTimeLine = pkiTimeLine,
		TimeLine
	)) ~> TimeLineCache
PackLineKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['LineKey'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		fkPackLine = pkiPackLine,
		LineKey
	)) ~> PackLineCache
BrewhouseKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['BrewhouseKey'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		fkBrewhouse = pkiBrewhouse,
		BrewhouseKey
	)) ~> BrewhouseCache
Select4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		fkDate as date,
		fkSite as long,
		fkLocation as long,
		fkPackLine as long,
		fkBrewhouse as long,
		fkMetric as long,
		fkDomain as integer,
		fkTimeLine as integer,
		Value as double,
		WeightingFactor as double,
		Target as double,
		TargetWeightingFactor as double,
		SourceLine as long,
		fkBatch as long,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		Disable as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	saveOrder: 5,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		fkDate,
		fkSite,
		fkLocation,
		fkPackLine,
		fkBrewhouse,
		fkMetric,
		fkDomain,
		fkTimeLine,
		Value,
		WeightingFactor,
		Target,
		TargetWeightingFactor,
		SourceLine,
		fkBatch,
		LastUpdated,
		Disable
	)) ~> InsertFactWM
